live_updates: Services have been stabilized and the issue is now resolved. We thank you for your patience during the interruption.
On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
39193.summary: Some customers in Southwest Hill area of Lethbridge are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39193.title: July 3 – Lethbridge (Southwest Hill) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
